characterDescription: Spark is Malata's spren, and has been identified as an ashspren. Through their bond, Spark affords Malata with the Surges of Division and Abrasion.

characterDetails.Appearance: Spark has not yet been seen.
characterDetails.Personality:
Taravangian states that, with regard to Spark, he and Malata need to be cautious because they can't be certain as to what Spark will do as her self-awareness grows. He says that she will surely dislike working against the other orders of Knights Radiant.
Malata responds that Spark is fine with what they're doing. That she's game for whatever it takes to get vengeance for how organized devotion to Honor killed hundreds of ashspren. And to whatever lets her break stuff.
characterDetails.Notes: It's possible that Spark may have been corrupted. This may be the cause of Malata's attitude toward the other Radiants, and why she and her spren are so unconcerned with Odium taking control.
